summary: A documentary on how Los Angeles has been used and depicted in the movies.
cast: Encke King|Ben Alexander|Jim Backus|Brenda Bakke|Barbarao|Gene Barry|Richard Basehart|Hugh Beaumont|William Bendix|Ann Blyth|Jim Bouton|Grand L. Bush|James Cagney|Lon Chaney Jr.|John Considine|Bill Cosby|Robert Culp|Howard Duff|Deanna Durbin|Mark Frechette|John Garfield|Ben Gazzara|Bruce Glover|Marjoe Gortner|James Griffith|Daria Halprin|Oliver Hardy|Jean Harlow|Bob Hope|Lauren Hutton|Henry Jaglom|David Janssen|Peter Jason|Roy Jenson|Jack Klugman|Alan Ladd|Stan Laurel|Al Leong|Jerry Lewis|Gary Lockwood|Perry Lopez|Lyle Lovett|Fred MacMurray|Guy Madison|Joe Mantell|Matt McCoy|Ralph Meeker|Sal Mineo|Harry Morgan|Robert Morley|Robert Morse|Tom Neal|Lloyd Nolan|Edmond O'Brien|Carroll O'Connor|Belinda Palmer|Jürgen Prochnow|Tony Roberts|Cliff Robertson|Mitchell Ryan|Ann Savage|Zachary Scott|Paolo Seganti|James Stacy|Madeleine Stowe|David Strathairn|Gloria Swanson|William Talman|Larenz Tate|George Tobias|Lana Turner|Diane Venora|John Vernon|Craig Wasson|Keenen Ivory Wayans|Jack Webb|Raquel Welch|James Whitmore|Cornel Wilde|Mykelti Williamson|Jonathan Winters|Natalie Wood|Jenny Wright|Burt Young|Darrell Zwerling
title: Los Angeles Plays Itself
